uploadView.heading: Welcome to Earth Summit My Photos
uploadView.subheading: Relive your Earth Summit moments - captured just for you
uploadView.microtext: Your photos are securely matched using AI so that you can view your personalized gallery.

instructionsModal.heading: Take a Clear Selfie
instructions: Position your face in the frame, no cut off.
Ensure your full face is clearly visible.
Ensure good lighting and avoid shadows.
Face the camera directly, without sunglasses or hats.
Only one face should appear in the photo.
instructionsModal.privacyNotice: Your photo will be used solely to help us identify and match your event pictures. It will not be shared publicly.
